sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: Computes the natural log of the gamma function for real arguments. The gammaln function takes only a single argument y = gammaln(x) where x is either a float or double array. The output vector y is the same size (and type) as x.

sect1.title: Example
sect1.para: Here is a plot of the gammaln function over the range [-5,5].
which results in the following plot. gammaln1
